comment.author: 26220432@N06
comment._content:
** translation of describtion **

Second World War, landwar Eastern Front. German shocktroops are firing with rifles and machineguns at the Russian defencelines at Leningrad. Russia/Soviet Union, Leningrad, 1941.

comment.author: 78705066@N00
comment._content: Light machine gun squad. Soldiers armed with MG 34 and rifles K98. Note soldier with flamethrower in the background.

comment.author: 14673419@N00
comment._content:
Übersetzung: 
Zweite Weltkrieg, Ostfront. Deutsche Stosstruppen beschiessen Russische Stellungen bei Leningrad

comment.author: 37324043@N00
comment._content:
Second World War, landwar Eastern Front. German shocktroops are firing with rifles and machineguns at the Russian defencelines at Leningrad. Russia/Soviet Union, Leningrad, 1941.

-- IN RUSSIAN --
Вторая Мировая Война, Восточный фронт. Ударные войска немцев ведут ружейный и пулемётный огонь по русским защитникам Ленинграда. СССР, Ленинград, 1941

comment.author: 13892947@N04
comment._content: If you're going to stand there shooting, please don't do it next to me with a flame thrower on your back!
